alert.note: Alert for Chase; Deuel; Hayes; Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued April 06 at 11:24AM CDT until April 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ THURSDAY... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Perkins, Hayes, Keith, Chase and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 9 PM CDT /8 PM MDT/ Thursday. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, until 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile and lightweight vehicles. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
